prompt: Navigate to the living room and pick up the child's building blocks from the floor.
Grab the empty laundry basket and take it to the washing machine.
Identify the specific type of bird making that loud noise outside the window.
Scan the entire shelf for any expired food items.
Push the heavy armchair slightly to the left to clean behind it.
Shift the stack of magazines on the coffee table to make room for a drink.
Listen for the sound of the timer going off in the kitchen.
Speak the current battery level of the robot itself.
Dance a short, repetitive sequence as a test of motor control.
Move fast to the designated charging dock, your battery is critical.
Greet the person standing by the bookshelf.
Pick up the remote from under the pillow on the bed.
Navigate to the garage and grab the car wash bucket.
Identify the smallest object on the desk.
Scan the QR code on the monitor for troubleshooting information.
Push the large, red emergency stop button if human presence is detected.
Shift the small vase on the kitchen counter a few centimeters to the right.
Listen for the sound of dripping water coming from the sink.
Speak a summary of today's weather in Be'er Sheva, Israel, including temperature and forecast.
Dance a short, graceful movement.
Move fast to the hallway to intercept the package delivery.
Greet the person wearing glasses in the room.
Pick up the discarded plastic bottle from the floor and place it in the recycling bin.
Navigate to the dining table and identify any leftover food.
Grab the remote control from the chair and turn on the television.
Scan the documents in the printer tray for readiness.
Push the door to the outside patio open.
Shift the laptop bag away from the walkway.
Listen for any changes in the wind direction outside.
Speak the current time in London, UK, on June 10, 2025.
Go to the kitchen and fetch a glass of water.
Pick up the wrench from the toolbox and bring it to the workshop.
Detect the red ball in the children's play area.
Examine the QR code on the parcel to get more details.
Shove the box across the room to the corner.
Relocate the chair closer to the table.
Hear for the doorbell and notify me when someone arrives.
Utter a greeting to the person entering the room.
Perform a jig to the rhythm currently playing.
Hurry to the charging station.
Head to the bedroom and retrieve the dirty clothes.
Spot the biggest feline in the room.
Snatch the water container from the table and bring it here.
Inspect the barcode on the milk carton.
Propel the shopping trolley to the checkout counter.
Move the large plant pot to the edge of the balcony.
Attend to the weather forecast and report the temperature.
Announce a welcome message to the visitors arriving.
Execute a short dance routine for the audience.
Dash to evade the obstacle.
Locate the garage and seize the toolkit.
Discern the blue vehicle in the parking lot.
Collect the keys from the hook by the entryway.
Examine the document for inaccuracies.
Depress the button on the elevator.
Adjust the volumes on the bookshelf to create more room.
Perceive the sound of flowing water.
Articulate the current time.
Perform a celebratory boogie.
Sprint through the crowded passage.
